fifty-fifty.translation[0].definitions[1: if there is a fifty-fifty chance of something happening, it is as equally likely to happen as not to happen
fifty-fifty.translation[1].definitions[0: divided or shared equally between two people, companies etc

fifty-fifty.translation[1].definitions[1: having an equal chance of happening in one of two ways
